title: By the King and Queen, a proclamation whereas we have received information that Edmond Ludlow, commonly called Colonel Ludlow, who stands attainted of high treason ...
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1689-1694 : William and Mary)
publisher: Printed by Charles Bill and Thomas Newcomb ...,
notes: "Given at our court at Whitehall, the fourteenth day of November, 1689, in the first year of our reign."
This item can be found at reels 951:46 and 1602:40.
Reproduction of originals in the Harvard University Library and Huntington Library.
